comments: Ms Hansen is hands down the best professor Ive ever had. She is so caring about her students and makes sure you understand clearly of what needs to be done. I had her for English 1A and there was a total of 3 papers. Show up to class, participate, ask questions and theres no way you will fail. She also responds to emails fairly quickly!

comments: She is a great teacher, she genuinely wants to help you, if you miss lab and class you will miss points, we do have 3-4 essay but she is very helpful with them.

comments: I took English 4 online and it was more challenging than I thought it was. I didn\'t have the same support I had last semester taking ENG1A. Be prepared to read and participate in discussion groups because points add up quickly. Easy points as long as you participate every week. Total of 4 essays on three required texts. Essays are worth 150pts.

comments: BEST ENGLISH TEACHER EVER! Hansen is so sweet and detail orientated she goes over everything in detail before it is due. Attendance is mandatory. If you need ENG 104 or any english take her!!!

comments: I took this class during the Summer on line, the class went quickly and papers due every week, which was expected for a summer program. Trying to cram 16/18 week program in 6 weeks. Professor Hansen made this bearable, she is very clear on her expectations and she provides examples to make it easier. I learned a lot from her. I would take again.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (10)  Respected (5)  Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Caring (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: I don\'t understand why there are so many good reviews here. Hansen is a very tough grader. She is really strict with grading essays and takes off points for missing commas and small grammar errors. If you are used to getting A\'s, B\'s on your essays from other English classes expect to get C\'s and D\'s with her. Essays have to be flawless with her.

comments: Jessica was the best english teacher i have ever had in college. she was so so so helpful and gave wonderful feedback. she cares so much about her students and wants them to succeed. She will accomodate you and support you always. If i can take another class with her i would choose her over any other proffessor

comments: Jessica is an awesome teacher. I have taken her for English 1A & 4 and she is incredibly helpful and actually wants her students to succeed. She encourages her students to go to her office hours so you should take advantage bc it helps a lot. Essays are pretty easy too. There is not an anthology but you do need to purchase the small reading books.

comments: Ms. Hansen was really awesome. She wasn\'t too tough of a grader when it came to papers. As long as it was obvious that you put work into writing it, you will most likely get an A or B. She was really sweet and super helpful. I\'m definitely taking one of her classes in the future.

comments: SUCH an incredible teacher! She is truly passionate about teaching and helping others. She is very flexible and willing to go out of her way to help her students. She involves the whole class and encourages class discussion, never making anyone feel stupid or wrong for their opinion. She assigns consistent homework. Recommend this class to anyone!!

comments: Ms. Hansen is the BEST TEACHER!!! Her work load is not to difficult more or less high school style. She is very helpful and sweet. We read Farewell to Manzanar, and had 2 quizzes. Quizzes are okay if you read. 3 typed/drafted essays and 1 hand-written final. She is awesome, should take her!!!
